Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hilton Cape Town City Centre, you'll be centrally located in Cape Town, steps from Bo Kaap Museum and Auwal Mosque. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Victoria and Alfred Waterfront and Table Mountain.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 136 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 7 meeting rooms available for events. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 136 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

With a stay at Hilton Cape Town City Centre, you'll be centrally located in Cape Town, steps from Bo Kaap Museum and Auwal Mosque. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Victoria and Alfred Waterfront and Table Mountain.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bo Kaap Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Auwal Mosque - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Christian Barnard Hospital - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Brundyn Gallery - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Pan African Market - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
AVA Gallery - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palm Tree Mosque - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Prins & Prins Diamonds Museum of Gems and Jewellery - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
South African Missionary Meeting House Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Greenmarket Square - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Old Town House - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Gold of Africa Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Cape Town Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
St. George's Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Georges Mall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Cape Town City Centre is Cape Town (CPT-Cape Town Intl.) - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
